name: codelab-bootstrap
description: use nodemon to watch changes on md file, rebuild codelab on saves

scripts.watch: nodemon --watch apigee-apim-integration.md --exec "claat export -o temp/ apigee-apim-integration.md ; ./node_modules/kill-port/cli.js --port 9090 ; cd temp/apigee-apim-integration ; claat serve"
